actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-656.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-656) Authorizes the expenditure of $1,930,000 by the Senate Committee on the Budget for inquiries and investigation from March 1, 1976, through February 28, 1977. Allocates $65,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the committee to report its findings and recommendations for legislation to the Senate no later than February 28, 1977.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.
